title: Breaking The Rules (CRE109)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our first two years! In our ninth episode, Christian Finnegan, Kevin Allison, Zak Orth, Melanie Hamlett and Faye Lane share stories of going beyond lawfulgalities.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Melanie Hamlett, Zak Orth, Faye Lane, Andrew Burnes, Stuckey & Murray, J. Walter Hawkes, Matt Cheplic, The Happy Hollows, Dan Rosen, Christian Finnegan, David Buchs, Kevin Allison)
